page.title: 05VANESSA'S SATURDAY
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF VANESSA} On most Saturday's I get up and go downstairs to have my breakfast.I turn on the television to make my cereal more interesting.When I have had my cereal,I put some bread in the toaster.I stand watching T.V. until my toast pops up.When it pops up,I take it over to the table,so I can spread some butter on,and some peanut butter.When I have had my toast,I go to the fridge and get a carrot for my guinea_pig.I then go up stairs to get dressed.I put my riding clothes on.I go into the bathroom to have a wash,and to clean my teeth.I go downstairs again and have a cup of tea or coffee.My mum is normally ready so we go outside and get into the car.We drive four miles down to where I keep my pony. (CONTINUED)
